name: Original puffball
description:
Original Puffball

Welcome to the puffball puzzles. Lots of hot-air on offer here... but use it wisely. You can only move a puffball indirectly, by targeting it with jets-of-air from another puffball. It will take logic and forward-planning to achieve the goal.

  • Number of puzzles: 12
  • Average play time: 1h+
  • First published: April 2013 (itch.io relaunch April 2023)
  • Background:  https://clickmazes.com/puffball/new-puffball.htm
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart; ESC for level-select.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.
  • Hackable source:  click here
